text: my name is marie schminski i'm a global
manager for partner solutions
architecture
being a
woman sa has definitely had its
challenges but seeing over the last
several years amazon or aws has made a
huge push in that space and we have some
amazing women leaders who have really
led the charge to make sure that there's
opportunities for mentorship but the
biggest one i think that i've seen is
sponsorship i have a couple
mentors who have also turned into
sponsors providing opportunities for me
as a woman and then i get to provide
those opportunities for the women that
are on my team so i think it's been
amazing to see this community grow
substantially over the past few years
whether you're early in your career or
looking to graduate college or a woman
who is looking to pivot to the tech
space or switch to aws i think the
biggest thing is to keep teaching
yourself or keep learning aws now has a
ton of free trainings and options so
that you could skill up on aws to learn
but i do think that we have a culture of
connection and feedback so if you know
people that work at aws or you know
folks that know people that work at aws
don't hesitate to reach out to them the
people that are here love their job and
want to share that with you and
encourage you to apply
[Music]
